H0.text: What is the currency of Lithuania. Euro

H1.text: What is the currency of Lithuania. Lit

H2.text: What is the currency of Lithuania. Balt

H3.text: What is the currency of Lithuania. Ltl

A4.text: The Lithuanian litas was replaced by the euro on 1 January 2015.

A5.text: The Lithuanian litas was the currency of Lithuania until 1 January 2015, when it was replaced by the euro.
